entry.question: Why did Gandhari vow to burn the three worlds, and what event triggered this extreme act of anger?

Her grief and fury over his demise drove her to this drastic measure, as described in the text: "घोरेण तपसा युक्तां त्रैलोक्यमपि सा दहेत्" (she would burn the three worlds with terrible austerity).
